# HEAPSIZE
[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

Expõe a mesma funcionalidade que a opção do vinculador de [\/HEAP](../../build/reference/heap-set-heap-size.md) .  
  
```  
/HEAP:reserve[,commit]  
```
